channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: アンダーグラウンドのフロッピーディスク音楽シーンを見る。Discogsのデータによると、2020年代には500以上のフロッピーディスク音楽がリリースされ、1980年代、1990年代、2000年代の合計よりも多い（Alexis Ong/The Verge）
item.description:
Alexis Ong / The Verge:
A look at the underground floppy disk music scene; Discogs data shows 500+ floppy music releases in the 2020s, more than in the 1980s, 1990s, and 2000s combined  —  The first computery thing I do in the year 2024 is nudge a 3.5-inch floppy disk into a USB floppy drive that I bought …

item.title: アイマックス、第4四半期の売上は8,600万ドル（予想8,959万ドル）、中国で映画館が急速に再開した2022年第4四半期から12％減、純利益は250万ドル（Etan Vlessing/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Etan Vlessing / The Hollywood Reporter:
Imax reports Q4 revenue of $86M, vs. $89.59M est., down 12% from Q4 2022, when Imax experienced a rapid reopening of cinemas in China, and net income of $2.5M  —  Overall quarterly revenue came to $86 million, down 12 percent from a year-earlier $98 million, as 'Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom …

item.title: プレミアムSVODのうち、米国の加入者数は2022年の前年比21.6％増から2023年には同10.1％増に減少、2023年の解約者数は2022年の1億430万人に対し1億450万人（Antenna調べ）
item.description:
Antenna:
Among premium SVODs, US subscriber growth fell from 21.6% YoY in 2022 to 10.1% YoY in 2023; 140.5M cancelled their subscriptions in 2023 vs. 104.3M in 2022  —  The headlines suggesting that the boom times are over for streaming video have been unavoidable.

item.title: TikTok、ユニバーサル・ミュージック・パブリッシング・グループが発表したすべての楽曲を削除、ライセンス契約を拡大、当初はUMGが所有または配布する楽曲のみが削除された（Jem Aswad/Variety）
item.description:
Jem Aswad / Variety:
TikTok removes all songs published by Universal Music Publishing Group, expanding a licensing spat; at first only songs owned or distributed by UMG were removed  —  The bruising battle over royalties between Universal Music Group and TikTok entered a new and more severe stage in the early hours …

item.title: オーセンティック、SI買収額9,000万ドルをライセンシングで回収：情報筋：SIは100万部発行、収支は黒字、ミニッツ・メディアが新出版社になる可能性（Ben Strauss/Washington Post）
item.description:
Ben Strauss / Washington Post:
Authentic says it has recouped its ~$90M SI purchase via licensing; sources: SI has 1M print subs, breaks even, and Minute Media is a potential new publisher  —  LAS VEGAS — “This is Sports Illustrated, the party!” the DJ yelled.  “Tonight is going to be legendary.”

item.title: ジュリア・アングウィンは、科学的手法を指針としてジャーナリズムを高めることを目的とした非営利スタジオ「プルーフ」を立ち上げ、アングウィンは創設者兼CEO兼EICを務める（Julia Angwin/Proof）
item.description:
Julia Angwin / Proof:
Julia Angwin launches Proof, a nonprofit studio aimed at elevating journalism by using the scientific method as a guiding ethos; Angwin is founder, CEO, and EIC  —  Hello world!  —  Welcome to Proof News.  Proof is meant to be an answer to the existential question that journalists are struggling with right now: What is our purpose?

item.title: 内部文書：Tumblrのスタッフは、AutomatticがAIツールを訓練するためにOpenAIとMidjourneyにデータを売却する取引の準備として、ユーザーのデータをまとめた（Samantha Cole/404 Media）。
item.description:
Samantha Cole / 404 Media:
Internal docs: Tumblr staff compiled users' data in preparation for deals where Automattic would sell the data to OpenAI and Midjourney to train AI tools  —  Join the newsletter to get the latest updates.  —  Success  —  Great!  Check your inbox and click the link.  —  Error

item.title: ドキュメントグーグルは一握りの独立系出版社に1年間5桁の金額を支払い、未発表のジェネレーティブAIツール群を使って記事を投稿してもらう（Mark Stenberg/Adweek）
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
Docs: Google is paying a handful of independent publishers a five-figure sum for one year to use an unreleased suite of generative AI tools to post stories  —  In exchange for a five-figure sum, publishers must use the tool to publish 3 stories per day  —  Google launched a private program …

item.title: デジタルTV広告サービスMadhiveが政治・問題広告主がCTV広告を購入できるマーケットプレイスを開始、Fox Television Stationsが最初の主要クライアント（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Digital TV ad service Madhive launches a marketplace for political and issue advertisers to buy CTV ads; Fox Television Stations is its first major client  —  - Connected TV also offers campaigns more video inventory to target voters when local broadcasters run out of space.

item.title: 提出：OpenAIは、NYTが「誰かに金を払ってOpenAIの製品をハッキングさせた」と主張し、OpenAIのTOSに違反したとして、米連邦裁判官にNYTの著作権訴訟の一部を却下するよう求めている（Blake Brittain/Reuters）
item.description:
Blake Brittain / Reuters:
Filing: OpenAI asks a US federal judge to dismiss parts of NYT's copyright suit, alleging it “paid someone to hack OpenAI's products” and violated OpenAI's TOS  —  OpenAI has asked a federal judge to dismiss parts of the New York Times (NYT.N) copyright lawsuit against it …

item.title: 情報筋WBDはパラマウントとの合併を追求せず、Skydanceはデューデリジェンス中、Comcastはパラマウントとの商業提携を模索中（Alex Sherman/CNBC）
item.description:
Alex Sherman / CNBC:
Sources: WBD is no longer pursuing a merger with Paramount, Skydance is doing due diligence, and Comcast is exploring commercial partnerships with Paramount  —  - Warner Bros. Discovery is no longer pursuing a merger with Paramount Global as its shares trade near a 52-week low, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: FT紙がメディアとハイテク新興企業に投資するベンチャー部門を立ち上げ、まずは職場に特化したメディアとインサイトを提供するCharter社に100万ドルを投資（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
The FT launches a venture arm to invest in media and tech startups, starting with $1M for Charter, a media and insights company focused on the workplace  —  - The company has made several strategic minority investments to date, including one in the Business of Fashion.

item.title: UMG、ナイジェリアを拠点とするレコード・レーベルMavin Globalの株式の過半数を買収、第3四半期までに完了予定。
item.description:
Dan Rys / Billboard:
UMG buys a majority stake in Nigeria-based record label Mavin Global in a deal expected to close by Q3; Mavin was reportedly valued at north of $125M in October  —  The company, home to artists like Rema and Ayra Starr, is at the forefront of Africa's Afrobeats movement, which has been exploding across the globe.

item.title: Netflixは、長年の加入者向けにApple iTunesの課金削除を開始し、現在はウェブサイトで直接支払うよう求めていることを確認した（Wes Davis/The Verge）。
item.description:
Wes Davis / The Verge:
Netflix confirms that it has started removing Apple iTunes billing for longtime subscribers, and now requires them to pay directly on its website  —  Netflix confirms to The Verge that it has begun booting longtime subscribers off their Apple iTunes billing plans, and will require …

item.title: BBCは、フー・エドワーズに関する苦情への対応に不備が見つかったため、編集以外の苦情への対応手順を強化すると発表した（Alexandra Topping/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Alexandra Topping / The Guardian:
The BBC says it will bolster its procedures for dealing with non-editorial complaints, after finding shortcomings in dealing with a complaint about Huw Edwards  —  Corporation launched review into complaints procedure after scandal about presenter last year
